Uses of Interface
framework.ComponentReferences

  • Packages that use ComponentReferences 
    Package Description
    externalInformationPort
    ExternalInformationPort component - Used for (UDP-)Information (for example a public key) exchange with "external" communication partners (for example other mixes or clients).
    framework
    The package framework introduces all parts of the mix and the overall framework, which are not exchanged.
    inputOutputHandler
    InputOutputHandler component - Handles (mix) message-based connections (see package Message) with communication partners (clients, other mixes and proxy servers) and therefore abstracts from the physical communication channels.
    keyGenerator
    KeyGenerator component - Used to generate cryptographic keys
    messageProcessor
    MessageProcessor component - Takes messages from component InputOutputHandler, processes them (recoding, checking for replays, removing/adding padding, initiating message authentication) and bypasses them to component OutputStrategy.
    networkClock
    Network Clock component - Provides a clock, which could be synchronized with an SNTP server.
    outputStrategy
    Output Strategy component - Collects messages until an output criterion is fulfilled (certain number of messages collected or timeout reached)
    userDatabase
    User Database component - Used to store user-specific data (for example identifiers, session keys or buffers)

    • Uses of ComponentReferences in externalInformationPort

      Classes in externalInformationPort that implement ComponentReferences 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasicExternalInformationPort
      Basic implementation of component ExternalInformationPort.
      class  ExternalInformationPortController
      Controller class of component ExternalInformationPort.

    • Uses of ComponentReferences in framework

      Classes in framework that implement ComponentReferences 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Controller
      The abstract class Controller provides all methods, interfaces and fields that are needed by every controller.
      class  Implementation
      The abstract class Implementation implements the ComponentReferences interface, so that a particular implementation of a component knows about all Controllers of all other components of the mix.
      class  Mix
      This class coordinates the components of this mix.

    • Uses of ComponentReferences in inputOutputHandler

      Classes in inputOutputHandler that implement ComponentReferences 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasicInputOutputHandler
      Basic implementation of component InputOutputHandler.
      class  InputOutputHandlerController
      Controller class of component InputOutputHandler.

      Classes in keyGenerator that implement ComponentReferences 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasicKeyGenerator
      Generates cryptographic keys.
      class  KeyGeneratorController
      Controller class of component KeyGenerator.

    • Uses of ComponentReferences in messageProcessor

      Classes in messageProcessor that implement ComponentReferences 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasicMessageProcessor
      Takes messages from component InputOutputHandler, processes them (recoding, checking for replays, removing/adding padding, initiating message authentication) and bypasses them to component OutputStrategy.
      class  MessageProcessorController
      Controller class of component MessageProcessor.

    • Uses of ComponentReferences in networkClock

      Classes in networkClock that implement ComponentReferences 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasicSystemTimeClock
      Provides a clock.
      class  NetworkClockController
      Controller class of component NetworkClock.

    • Uses of ComponentReferences in outputStrategy

      Classes in outputStrategy that implement ComponentReferences 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasicBatch
      Basic implementation class of component OutputStrategy.
      class  BasicPool
      Basic implementation class of component OutputStrategy.
      class  OutputStrategyController
      Controller class of component OutputStrategy.
